title: C. Govindarajan
text: C. Govindarajan (15 September 1921 – 26 January 2008) was a freedom fighter, Indian politician, and former <a href="Member%20of%20the%20Legislative%20Assembly%20%28India%29">Member of the Legislative Assembly</a> of <a href="Tamil%20Nadu">Tamil Nadu</a>. He was one of the founder-members of the CPI(M) Tamilnadu, he worked for the growth of the party in the Unified South Arcot District. He had also served as the party State Committee member for a long time. He was elected to the <a href="Tamil%20Nadu%20legislative%20assembly">Tamil Nadu legislative assembly</a> as a <a href="Communist%20Party%20of%20India%20%28Marxist%29">Communist Party of India (Marxist)</a> candidate from <a href="Nellikuppam%20%28State%20Assembly%20Constituency%29">Nellikuppam constituency</a> in <a href="1967%20Tamil%20Nadu%20state%20assembly%20election">1967</a> and <a href="1977%20Tamil%20Nadu%20state%20assembly%20election">1977 elections</a>.
